text.s:
What
are the five
lessons
learnt from the
evaluation and what do these
mean for the
nature
conservation
policy ?

These
are not necessarily indicative of general
species
trends in each
region , but illustrative of the kinds of data
used in the Living
Planet
Index .

The
government
provides the
farmer with a subsidy for this
management
function .

There
are also large rural
regions , whose
populations are currently
experiencing high population growth , while the urban
areas are
showing a small
decline .
